name: ts-morph-playground
description: ts-morph example gallery and playground application 100% in the browser

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx parcel build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --public-url './' && npm run copy
scripts.build-local: npm run build && gzip docs/*.* && npx http-server docs --gzip
scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build

author: Sebastian Gurin
